## Profiling Results:
```{r ,echo=FALSE}
base.path = "~/Desktop/CSE_481/length_profiles/"

for (i in 1:5) {
  full.path = paste(base.path, i, ".csv", sep = "")
  test.data = read.csv(full.path)
  colnames(test.data)[1] <- "prob"
  summary(test.data$prob)
  t = paste("length ", i, " profile", sep = "")
  hist(test.data$prob, xlab = "probability", ylab = "Frequency", main = t, breaks = seq(-15, 0, 0.5))
  #print(full.path)
  #test.data = 
}
```
